title: Alfa Romeo - Wikipedia
snippet: Alfa Romeo have been in a technical partnership with the Sauber F1 Team since 2018. In February 2019, Sauber announced that it would compete as Alfa Romeo Racing although the ownership, racing licence and management structure would remain unchanged.

title: Who owns Alfa Romeo? | Alfa Romeo History | Genesis Alfa Romeo
snippet: When you see the stylish Giulia or Stelvio cruising on the streets around Grosse Pointe, you may start to wonder, “who owns Alfa Romeo?” Alfa Romeo has been owned by Fiat-Chrysler Automobiles (FCA) since 2007. While FCA has owned this luxury brand for over a decade, it still maintains its signature Italian flair.

title: r/AlfaRomeo on Reddit: A New Alfa Romeo CEO
snippet: This could also mean Alfa being closer to Maserati rather than the former PSA brands like Peugeot which i can see as a very good thing. ... I wished the mgmt was kept the same for a while. It’s hard to make long term plans if you keep changing management ... Whatever they were doing, it wasn't working. FCA's plans for Alfa were a new GTV and a new 6C.

title: Who Makes Alfa Romeo? | Ron Lewis Alfa Romeo
snippet: Who Makes Alfa Romeo: Stellantis currently oversees the production and development of Alfa Romeo vehicles. This multinational corporation was established in 2021 through the merger of Fiat Chrysler Automobiles (FCA) and PSA Group. Despite corporate ownership changes, Alfa Romeo maintains its distinctive Italian heritage and identity, with design and engineering remaining centered in Italy and vehicles manufactured in Italian facilities.

title: Who Owns Alfa Romeo? | Who Makes Alfa Romeo? | Zeigler Alfa Romeo of Schaumburg
snippet: Fiat-Chrysler Automobiles (FCA) now owns Alfa Romeo. Learn more about this acquisition and how it’s inspired innovation since 2007 from Zeigler Alfa Romeo of Schaumburg.
